title: Regulation (EEC) No 986/73 of the Council of 9 April 1973 amending Regulation No 724/67/EEC as regards the conditions for intervention in respect of sunflower seed during the last two months of the marketing year
header:
REGULATION (EEC) No 986/73 OF THE COUNCIL  of 9 April 1973  amending Regulation No 724/67/EEC as regards the conditions for intervention in respect of sunflower seed during the last two months of the marketing year
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
